title: Amethyst

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the Rock Is a Rock Killing or performs the factional rock kill and the target survives the attack, they will be cursed. Cursed players will be dealt an Basic Attack 2 days after. Otherwise, grant your Rock Basic Defense.
-You may not follow a Rock twice in a row.
-If you're the only Rock left standing, you will autofollow yourself alongside the Factional rock kill every night.
- If you exist in the game, Odd Keystone will be rerolled to another random rock role, because Stones are not rocks, and fuck you Rasen.

desc:
Post 179
*Those inflicted by the Amethyst' curses never survive...unless they have Basic or higher defense.*
